summary: Exactly 100 years after the Armenian Genocide, a theatre director stages a play to bring the ghosts of the past back to life.
cast: Simon Abkarian|Angela Sarafyan|Sam Page|Nikolai Kinski|Jim Piddock|Debra Christofferson|Courtney Halverson|Christopher Clausi|Gail Cook|Myles Cranford|Marc Forget|Robert Hallak|David Imani|Mercy Malick|Sunny Suljic|Lory Tatoulian
